rows.label: qst610105_msg0001
rows.name:
So, how's it goin'? Anyone
have any good leads?

rows.label: qst610105_msg0002
rows.name: Hmm, I see.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0003
rows.name: So what you're telling me is...

rows.label: qst610105_msg0004
rows.name:
The timber was stolen when the
site was closed for the day.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0005
rows.name:
I already knew that, though. Ugh,
I'd hoped that the Boss woulda
known somethin' more useful.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0006
rows.name:
And you also found out some
Tirkin have been keepin'
an eye on this place?

rows.label: qst610105_msg0007
rows.name:
Very suspicious. Maybe
they're our culprits!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0008
rows.name:
And seeing as someone saw
a big pile of timber by the
hut near Seigle Fell...

rows.label: qst610105_msg0009
rows.name:
You reckon those Tirkin are stashing
what they steal down there?

rows.label: qst610105_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, I guess we're gettin'
somewhere. Not bad.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0011
rows.name:
You think you could check this
hut out? Maybe we'll get to the
bottom of those Tirkin's tricks.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0012
rows.name:
Knew I could count on you.
Watch your back out there.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0101
rows.name:
Ah, you made it back in
one piece! Good to see.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0102
rows.name: So...what did you find?

rows.label: qst610105_msg0103
rows.name: So it WAS the Tirkin. I shoulda known.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0104
rows.name:
And you say they dropped a carving?
Hand it over, let me have a look.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0105
rows.name: A-amazing!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0106
rows.name:
It's so detailed! I've
never seen work like it!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0107
rows.name:
It takes a real love and respect for your
materials to make carvings like this. I
never knew the Tirkin had it in them.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0108
rows.name: Hang on! I just had a great idea!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0109
rows.name:
Folk in Superbia would pay a
fortune for something like this.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0110
rows.name:
All we gotta do is buddy up with the
Tirkin, give them the lumber and have
them carve it. Great idea or what?

rows.label: qst610105_msg0111
rows.name: ...Oh, what am I saying?!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0112
rows.name:
You already, uh, took out the
Tirkin who did this, didn't you?!

rows.label: qst610105_msg0113
rows.name:
No, it's fine... You just
did what I asked you to do.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0114
rows.name:
Tell you what... Take this
carving over to the accessory
shop in Torigo.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0115
rows.name:
I'll let Irene know you're coming.
If anyone can make something
good out of this, it's her.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0116
rows.name: Nah, I should be the one thankin' you.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0117
rows.name:
It's a proper relief to know we don't
have to worry about those thieves any
more. But...mixed feelings and all.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0201
rows.name:
Man, I never woulda guessed the Tirkin
could make something like that.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0202
rows.name:
I guess we took somethin'
beautiful outta this world...

rows.label: qst610105_msg0203
rows.name:
Take their last carving over to
the accessory shop in Torigo.

rows.label: qst610105_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll let Irene know you're coming.
If anyone can make something
good out of this, it's her.
